@Adam Holmes @AbdulMalik Shakir vrdr issues:

  • version should be 0.1.0 not 1.0
  • needs a package-list.json
@Grahame Grieve I believe that you are the administrator for the HL7 Simplifier license. If that is true, would you please grant @Adam Holmes access to the BSeR project in Simplifier. Thanks.
